name: Isle of Trials
description:
Proof of concept play to earn MMO using some asset packs and Dynamo Coin wallet APIs.

Check out our youtube channel for more details on controls and testing.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC41D2XCb3wRgYsy-Yyr0nJw

Visit our website and join discord to hang out with our friendly community:  https://www.dynamocoin.org
